code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import Movie from"../components/Movie";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[movieList,setMovieList]=useState([]);const getMovies=async()=>{const response=await fetch("https://yts.mx/api/v2/list_movies.json?minimum_rating=8.5&sort_by=year");const json=await response.json();setMovieList(json.data.movies);setLoading(false);};useEffect(()=>{getMovies();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie_list",children:[loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Loading..."}):null,!loading&&movieList.map(movie=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Movie,{id:movie.id,coverImg:movie.medium_cover_image,title:movie.title,summay:movie.summary,genres:movie.genres},movie.id);})]});}export default Home;
